name: Inconsistent Author Contribution Metrics Across Research Teams
description_html: The author contribution calculation algorithm is producing inconsistent results when aggregating research output metrics across different teams. Some department-level reports show contribution percentages exceeding 100%, while others underreport collaborative work. This affects institutional performance tracking and resource allocation decisions.

name: Real-time Analytics Processing Latency Exceeding SLA
description_html: The real-time analytics processing pipeline is experiencing significant delays, with latency spikes up to 45 minutes during peak usage. This affects live dashboard updates and real-time research impact metrics. Current performance is well above our 5-minute SLA target, impacting stakeholder decision-making capabilities.

name: Cross-Referenced Publication Impact Scores Not Syncing
description_html: Impact scores for cross-referenced publications are failing to sync properly between the primary analytics database and the distributed caching layer. This causes discrepancies in research impact reporting and affects the accuracy of institutional rankings calculations.

name: Funding Analysis Dashboard Memory Optimization
description_html: The funding analysis dashboard is experiencing severe performance degradation due to inefficient memory usage when processing large datasets. Users report timeout errors when attempting to analyze grant data across multiple fiscal years. This is preventing research administrators from accessing critical funding trend data.

name: Geographic Research Distribution Visualization Bug
description_html: The geographic research distribution heat map is incorrectly aggregating location data for multi-institution collaborations, resulting in misleading visualization of research activity clusters. This affects strategic partnership decisions and global research impact analysis.

name: Citation Network Graph Rendering Performance Degradation
description_html: The citation network visualization component is experiencing significant performance issues when rendering networks with more than 1000 nodes. Users report 5+ second delays and browser freezing when exploring large citation networks. This impacts researcher ability to analyze citation patterns effectively.

name: Batch Analytics Job Queue Overflow During Peak Hours
description_html: The analytics processing queue is hitting maximum capacity during peak research hours (1PM-4PM UTC), causing job failures and incomplete dataset generation. Multiple institutional customers have reported missing data points in their research impact reports.

name: Interdisciplinary Research Score Calculation Error
description_html: The algorithm calculating interdisciplinary research scores is incorrectly weighting cross-field citations, leading to undervalued scores for papers spanning multiple disciplines. This affects department rankings and funding allocation decisions.

name: Research Trend Prediction Model Accuracy Drift
description_html: The machine learning model used for predicting emerging research trends is showing increasing error rates over the past 3 months. Validation against actual publication patterns shows a 15% decrease in prediction accuracy, affecting strategic planning tools.

name: Peer Review Analytics Dashboard Time-out Issues
description_html: The peer review analytics dashboard is experiencing frequent timeout errors when generating comprehensive reports for journals with high submission volumes. This is preventing editors from accessing crucial peer review performance metrics.

name: Institution Collaboration Network Data Inconsistency
description_html: Detected mismatches in institution collaboration network data between real-time analytics and historical aggregates. Some international institution partnerships are not being correctly identified, impacting collaboration metrics and partnership opportunities.

name: API Rate Limiting Affecting External Analytics Integration
description_html: Current API rate limits are causing data synchronization failures with partner institutions' analytics platforms. Several universities report incomplete research impact data due to throttled API requests during their automated daily syncs.

name: Open Access Impact Metrics Calculation Bug
description_html: The system is incorrectly calculating impact metrics for open access publications by double-counting certain types of citations. This is resulting in inflated impact scores for OA journals and affecting institutional OA policy decisions.

name: Historical Data Migration Script Timeout for Legacy Metrics
description_html: Migration script for pre-2020 research metrics consistently times out when processing datasets larger than 500MB. This affects the backfilling of historical analytics and prevents complete year-over-year comparison analysis. Impact includes incomplete trending data and gaps in longitudinal research impact studies.

name: Elasticsearch Query Optimization for Multi-Field Author Analytics
description_html: Complex author analytics queries involving multiple fields (h-index, citation count, collaboration score) are causing high CPU utilization and response times exceeding 10 seconds. This impacts real-time author profile updates and slows down the researcher discovery interface.

name: Kafka Stream Processing Delay in Research Topic Trend Analysis
description_html: Stream processing pipeline for real-time research topic trend analysis is experiencing delays of up to 30 minutes. This affects the accuracy of trending topics dashboard and impacts recommendation engine performance for suggesting relevant research papers.

name: Redis Cache Invalidation Issues for Aggregated Citation Metrics
description_html: Stale citation metrics are being served due to improper cache invalidation in Redis cluster. This results in researchers seeing outdated impact factors and citation counts for up to 24 hours after updates occur in the primary database.

name: Memory Leak in Python Data Processing Worker for Journal Rankings
description_html: Data processing workers handling journal impact calculations are experiencing memory leaks, causing container crashes after 48 hours of operation. This disrupts continuous journal ranking updates and affects the reliability of journal comparison tools.

name: PDF Analytics Parser Failing for Non-Latin Character Sets
description_html: Analytics parser for PDF content metrics fails to properly process documents containing non-Latin characters, particularly in East Asian languages. This results in incomplete research impact analysis for international publications and affects global research visibility metrics.

name: Concurrent Access Deadlock in Funding Analytics Module
description_html: Multiple simultaneous requests to the funding analytics calculation module are causing deadlocks in the database, resulting in failed updates and incomplete grant impact assessments. This affects institutional funding reports and grant success rate analytics.

name: Time Series Aggregation Bug in Research Output Metrics
description_html: Weekly and monthly aggregations for research output metrics are showing discrepancies due to timezone handling issues. This causes inconsistent reporting in institutional dashboards and affects year-end research productivity analytics.

name: Author Contribution Weight Calculation Discrepancy
description_html: The algorithm calculating author contribution weights is producing inconsistent results when handling multi-institutional collaborations. Several cases reported where primary authors are being assigned lower weights than supporting contributors, affecting institutional ranking accuracy.

name: Real-time Analytics Websocket Connection Instability
description_html: Users are experiencing intermittent disconnections in real-time analytics dashboards, particularly during high-traffic periods. Websocket connections are dropping approximately every 15 minutes, requiring manual refresh and disrupting data monitoring sessions.

name: Preprint Version Analytics Correlation Bug
description_html: The system is failing to properly correlate analytics between preprint versions and final published articles, resulting in fragmented impact metrics. This affects the accuracy of research impact tracking and creates duplicate entries in the analytics database.

name: Machine Learning Model Drift in Research Topic Classification
description_html: The ML model responsible for automatic research topic classification is showing significant accuracy drift over time, particularly with emerging research fields. Current accuracy has dropped from 92% to 78% in the past month, affecting recommendation engine performance.

name: Custom Analytics Export Job Memory Optimization
description_html: Custom analytics export jobs are consuming excessive memory when processing large datasets (>1M rows), causing OOM errors on the worker nodes. This is particularly problematic for institutional users requesting comprehensive historical data exports.

name: Funding Source Impact Analysis Pipeline Timeout
description_html: The automated pipeline analyzing research impact by funding source is timing out for large grant databases. The current timeout limit of 300 seconds is insufficient for processing complex funding relationships and their associated research outputs.

name: Data Sampling Bias in Geographic Research Distribution Analysis
description_html: The geographic distribution analysis module is showing sampling bias towards institutions in certain regions due to timezone-based data collection intervals. This results in underrepresentation of research activities from Asia-Pacific institutions and skewed global collaboration metrics. Immediate investigation needed as this affects quarterly research diversity reports.

name: Cross-Reference Resolution Latency in Co-Author Network Analysis
description_html: Co-author network visualization is experiencing significant delays (>30s) when resolving cross-references for authors with multiple institutional affiliations. The bottleneck appears in the graph database queries, causing timeout issues for networks with more than 1000 nodes. This impacts the real-time collaboration insights feature used by institutional subscribers.

name: Inconsistent DOI Resolution in Citation Impact Metrics
description_html: The citation impact calculation service is failing to properly resolve DOIs with special characters or from certain repositories, leading to undercounted impact metrics for approximately 8% of publications. This affects institutional rankings and researcher profiles, particularly for interdisciplinary publications.

name: Batch Processing Failure for Large-Scale Altmetrics Updates
description_html: The nightly batch processing job for updating altmetrics scores is failing when processing datasets larger than 500GB. Investigation shows memory allocation issues in the Spark cluster during social media mention aggregation. This has caused stale altmetrics data for publications from the past 72 hours.

name: Peer Review Time Analytics Calculation Error
description_html: The peer review timeline analytics module is incorrectly calculating review durations by including weekends and holidays, resulting in inflated metrics. This affects journal efficiency scores and reviewer performance metrics, particularly impacting journals with international reviewer pools across multiple time zones.

name: Research Grant Success Rate Analytics Data Inconsistency
description_html: Grant success rate calculations are showing inconsistencies when comparing institutional vs. individual researcher metrics due to improper handling of collaborative grants. The discrepancy affects funding trend analysis and institutional benchmarking reports used by research offices.

name: API Rate Limiting Issues in Real-time Metrics Dashboard
description_html: The real-time metrics dashboard is hitting API rate limits when multiple users simultaneously access institution-wide analytics, causing partial data loading and timeout errors. This particularly affects large institutions during peak usage hours when generating end-of-semester reports.

name: Keyword Extraction Accuracy for Non-English Research Papers
description_html: The automated keyword extraction service is showing reduced accuracy (below 65%) for non-English research papers, particularly for Asian languages and papers with mixed language content. This affects topic clustering and research trend analysis for international institutions.

name: Inconsistent Session Duration Metrics for PDF Reader Analytics
description_html: Session duration calculations for PDF reader analytics are showing inconsistent results when users switch between multiple documents in the same session. The current implementation fails to properly track multi-document reading sessions, leading to underreported engagement metrics and inaccurate average reading time calculations. This affects our ability to measure content engagement accurately.

name: Data Pipeline Latency in Institution-Level Collaboration Metrics
description_html: The data pipeline for calculating institution-level research collaboration metrics is experiencing significant delays, with processing times exceeding 4 hours for daily updates. This is causing stale data in the institutional dashboard and affecting strategic partnership decisions. Investigation needed into pipeline optimization and potential parallel processing implementation.

name: Visualization Rendering Issues for Large Dataset Scatter Plots
description_html: Performance degradation observed when rendering scatter plots with more than 50,000 data points in the research trend analysis dashboard. Browser crashes reported by users when attempting to interact with large visualization sets. Need to implement data sampling or progressive loading strategies to improve visualization performance.

name: Anomaly Detection False Positives in Download Pattern Analysis
description_html: The automated anomaly detection system for identifying unusual download patterns is generating an excessive number of false positives, particularly during conference periods. Current threshold settings are too sensitive, causing unnecessary alerts and making it difficult to identify genuine suspicious activity. Requires recalibration of detection algorithms and implementation of context-aware filtering.

name: Incomplete Data Capture for Mobile App Usage Analytics
description_html: Mobile app analytics events are not being consistently captured and processed, resulting in incomplete user behavior data. Approximately 15% of mobile session data is missing from the analytics database, particularly for offline reading sessions that sync later. This gaps in data affect our understanding of mobile user engagement patterns.

name: Redis Cache Invalidation Issues in Real-time Analytics Dashboard
description_html: Redis cache invalidation is not properly triggering for real-time analytics updates, causing stale data to be displayed in the dashboard for up to 30 minutes. This affects the accuracy of live metrics and requires manual cache clearing to update. Need to implement proper cache invalidation strategy and monitoring.

name: Elasticsearch Query Timeout for Complex Research Impact Metrics
description_html: Complex queries calculating research impact metrics are timing out in Elasticsearch when processing data spanning multiple years. Queries involving cross-referenced citations and institutional collaboration networks regularly exceed the 30-second timeout limit. Performance optimization needed for large-scale aggregate calculations.

name: Incorrect Aggregation of Multi-Language Research Tag Analytics
description_html: The analytics system is incorrectly aggregating research tags across different languages, treating similar tags in different languages as distinct entities. This leads to fragmented tag popularity metrics and affects the accuracy of research trend analysis. Need to implement proper language normalization and tag mapping.

name: Incorrect Aggregation of Cross-Institution Research Collaboration Metrics
description_html: The collaboration metrics aggregation algorithm is incorrectly counting joint research projects between institutions, leading to underreported collaboration scores. This affects institutional partnership dashboards and impacts strategic decision-making for research funding allocation. The root cause appears to be improper handling of multi-institution affiliations in the aggregation pipeline.

name: Time Series Visualization Breaks for Long-Term Citation Trend Analysis
description_html: The time series visualization component fails to properly render citation trends spanning more than 5 years. Users report blank charts and browser console errors when attempting to view long-term citation impact analysis. This prevents researchers from analyzing historical citation patterns and impact factor trends effectively.

name: Memory Overflow in Geographic Research Distribution Heat Map
description_html: The geographic heat map visualization for research output distribution is causing memory overflow errors when processing datasets with more than 100,000 data points. This affects the global research trends analysis feature and prevents institutions from viewing their worldwide research impact distribution.

name: Funding Source Attribution Analytics Missing Private Sector Grants
description_html: The funding source attribution analytics engine is failing to capture and categorize private sector research grants, resulting in incomplete funding analysis reports. This affects the accuracy of funding diversity metrics and impacts understanding of industry-academia collaboration patterns.

name: Research Topic Clustering Algorithm Performance Degradation
description_html: The machine learning algorithm responsible for clustering research topics is showing significant performance degradation when processing interdisciplinary papers. Processing time has increased by 300% and cluster accuracy has dropped below acceptable thresholds, impacting the trending research topics dashboard.

name: Preprint Version Impact Metrics Not Updating After Publication
description_html: The analytics system is failing to update impact metrics when preprints are published as peer-reviewed articles. This causes fragmented impact statistics and leads to underreported citation counts in researcher profiles and institutional dashboards.

name: Open Access Compliance Tracking Analytics System Timeout
description_html: The Open Access compliance tracking system is timing out when generating reports for large institutions with over 5000 publications per year. This prevents research administrators from monitoring and reporting on their institution's compliance with funding body Open Access requirements.

name: GPU Memory Leaks in Transformer Training Pipeline
description_html: Training process for large language models is experiencing memory leaks during extended training sessions. GPU utilization gradually increases over time until OOM errors occur, typically after 4-6 hours of continuous training. This affects model convergence and requires manual pipeline restarts.

name: Cross-validation Failures in Multi-modal Classification
description_html: Cross-validation process for the image-text classification model is producing inconsistent results across folds. Validation accuracy varies by up to 15% between folds, suggesting potential data leakage or stratification issues in the validation split process.

name: Embeddings Cache Synchronization Error
description_html: Document embedding cache is not properly synchronizing across worker nodes, causing duplicate computation and inconsistent vector representations. This is increasing API latency by 2.3x and causing occasional mismatches in similarity search results.

name: False Positives in Duplicate Content Detection
description_html: Content similarity algorithm is flagging legitimate variations of methodology sections as duplicates. Current threshold settings result in 23% false positive rate for research papers with standard experimental procedures, causing unnecessary manual review overhead.

name: Batch Processing Deadlocks in Feature Engineering
description_html: Feature generation pipeline is experiencing deadlocks during parallel processing of large document batches. Race conditions in the tokenization and embedding generation steps cause occasional process hanging, requiring manual intervention and resulting in incomplete feature sets.

name: Attention Layer Performance Degradation in Citation Network Analysis
description_html: Performance metrics show significant degradation in the attention mechanism when processing large citation networks. Model accuracy dropped from 89% to 76% when handling graphs with >10k nodes. This impacts the quality of citation recommendations and academic relationship mapping.

name: Token Length Inconsistencies in Abstract Summarization
description_html: Abstract summarization model producing inconsistent output lengths, ranging from 50 to 300 tokens when target length is set to 150. This variability affects the standardization of research paper previews and impacts downstream tasks in the content pipeline.

name: Methodology Classification Bias for Interdisciplinary Papers
description_html: Current methodology classification model shows systematic bias when handling interdisciplinary research papers. Model tends to heavily favor primary discipline classification while missing secondary methodological approaches, affecting the accuracy of research methodology analysis.

name: Reference String Parsing Failures for Non-Standard Citations
description_html: Reference extraction model failing to correctly parse non-standard citation formats, particularly from older publications and specialized journals. Error rate increases to 45% for papers published before 1990, creating gaps in citation network analysis.

name: Gradient Instability in Multi-Task Research Topic Classifier
description_html: Multi-task learning model for research topic classification experiencing gradient instability during training. Loss function shows erratic behavior after epoch 50, leading to suboptimal convergence and reduced accuracy in topic assignments.

name: Temporal Coherence Issues in Research Trend Analysis
description_html: Trend analysis model failing to maintain temporal coherence when tracking research topic evolution. Sequential pattern detection shows discontinuities at yearly boundaries, affecting the reliability of longitudinal trend reports.

name: Dataset Contamination in Cross-References Validation
description_html: Discovered potential dataset contamination in cross-reference validation sets. Approximately 8% of validation samples appear to have leaked into training data, potentially inflating reported accuracy metrics for reference matching.

name: Inference Latency Spikes in Figure Caption Generation
description_html: Figure caption generation model experiencing unexpected latency spikes during inference, particularly for complex scientific diagrams. Processing time increases by 300% for figures with multiple subplots, creating bottlenecks in document processing pipeline.

name: Vector Quantization Errors in Knowledge Graph Embeddings
description_html: Knowledge graph embeddings are showing significant quantization errors when compressed for production deployment. This is causing reduced accuracy in semantic similarity searches and relationship inference. Impact observed across multiple academic domains, particularly affecting interdisciplinary connection discovery.

name: Sequence Length Optimization Failures in Method Section Analysis
description_html: Dynamic sequence length adjustment algorithm is failing to properly truncate methodology sections, leading to information loss in longer research papers. Current implementation drops critical experimental details and statistical significance information.

name: Author Disambiguation Model Degradation for Non-Latin Names
description_html: Author identification accuracy has dropped below acceptable thresholds for non-Latin name variations, particularly affecting Asian and Middle Eastern author networks. System is incorrectly splitting single authors into multiple entities based on different romanization patterns.

name: Zero-Shot Classification Failures for Emerging Research Fields
description_html: Zero-shot topic classification model unable to accurately categorize papers from emerging research fields, especially in quantum computing and synthetic biology domains. New terminology and methodologies are being misclassified into traditional categories.

name: Mathematical Formula Extraction Errors in PDF Preprocessing
description_html: PDF preprocessing pipeline is failing to correctly extract and preserve mathematical formulas, resulting in corrupted equations in the training dataset. This is affecting model performance for papers in physics, mathematics, and computational fields.

name: Checkpoint Restoration Failures in Distributed Training
description_html: Model checkpoint restoration is failing intermittently during distributed training across GPU clusters, causing training interruptions and loss of progress. Issue appears related to weight synchronization timing in multi-node setups.

name: Attention Mechanism Collapse for Multi-Language Code Snippets
description_html: Attention mechanism is failing to properly process code snippets containing multiple programming languages, causing information loss in methodology sections of computational papers. Particularly affects papers with mixed Python/R implementations.

name: Citation Graph Embedding Instability for Preprint Updates
description_html: Citation graph embeddings become unstable when processing frequent updates to preprint versions, causing temporal inconsistencies in relationship modeling. This affects recommendation accuracy for papers with multiple revision cycles.

name: Memory Leaks in Batch Inference Pipeline for Document Clustering
description_html: Memory utilization increases exponentially during large-scale document clustering runs, causing OOM errors after processing ~50k documents. Investigation shows potential memory leaks in the embedding cache management system. This affects production clustering accuracy and requires frequent pipeline restarts.

name: Inconsistent Feature Attribution Scores for Domain-Specific Terminology
description_html: SHAP values for domain-specific technical terms show unexplained variance across different runs of the explanation pipeline. This impacts the reliability of our feature importance analysis for specialized research fields and reduces trust in the model's decision-making process.

name: Data Pipeline Stalls During Multi-Modal Feature Extraction
description_html: Feature extraction pipeline frequently stalls when processing combined text and image inputs from research papers. Bottleneck appears during synchronization of different modality processors, causing significant delays in training data preparation and model updates.

name: Batch Normalization Statistics Drift in Transfer Learning Setup
description_html: Transfer learning performance degrading over time due to incorrect handling of batch normalization statistics during domain adaptation. Models show reduced accuracy when adapting to new research fields, particularly affecting performance on smaller, specialized domains.

name: Curriculum Learning Scheduler Fails for Hierarchical Document Classification
description_html: Current curriculum learning implementation fails to properly schedule training examples for hierarchical document classification. System is not correctly prioritizing easier examples before moving to more complex ones, leading to suboptimal model convergence and reduced classification accuracy.

name: Cross-Validation Fold Contamination in Sequential Paper Processing
description_html: Data leakage detected in cross-validation pipeline when processing sequential paper versions. Current fold splitting strategy doesn't account for paper version relationships, leading to contaminated validation sets and overly optimistic performance metrics.

name: Transformer Attention Sparsity Pattern Degradation
description_html: Learned attention sparsity patterns becoming less efficient over training iterations, leading to increased computation time and reduced model interpretability. Pattern degradation particularly affects long document processing and cross-document relationship analysis.

name: Gradient Accumulation Errors in Distributed Training of Citation Network Model
description_html: Inconsistent gradient accumulation observed during distributed training of citation network analysis model. Issue causes training instability and convergence problems, particularly when processing large-scale citation graphs across multiple GPUs.

name: Token Vocabulary Saturation in Multilingual Abstract Processing
description_html: The tokenizer vocabulary for multilingual abstract processing is reaching saturation, causing increased unknown token rates (>12%) for papers from emerging research fields. This affects translation quality and cross-lingual retrieval accuracy. Immediate vocabulary expansion and retraining needed to maintain performance across all supported languages.

name: Temporal Coherence Loss in Long-Term Citation Prediction
description_html: Citation prediction model shows degrading performance for papers published more than 5 years apart, with temporal coherence dropping by 45%. Current architecture fails to capture long-term research trend evolution, leading to unreliable recommendations for historical papers and emerging research connections.

name: Figure-Text Alignment Errors in Multi-Column Layout Analysis
description_html: Figure caption matching algorithm failing to correctly align images with corresponding text in multi-column academic papers, particularly in papers with complex layouts or supplementary figures. Current accuracy is 78%, below acceptable threshold of 95%. Impacts automated knowledge extraction and figure search functionality.

name: Abstract Generation Hallucination for Low-Resource Topics
description_html: Abstract generation model producing factually incorrect information for papers in low-resource research areas, with hallucination rate of 23% on emerging topics. Model shows over-reliance on common patterns from high-resource domains, requiring domain-specific fine-tuning and improved fact verification.

name: Semantic Drift in Incremental Model Updates for Topic Classification
description_html: Incremental learning updates to the topic classification model causing semantic drift, with accuracy decreasing 3% per update cycle. Previously stable categories showing increasing confusion scores. Need to implement constraint learning and semantic consistency checks in update pipeline.

name: Dataset Contamination from Preprint-Publication Pairs
description_html: Training dataset quality compromised by undetected preprint-final publication pairs, leading to data leakage across train/test splits. Affects 7% of the corpus and causes artificial inflation of model performance metrics. Requires improved deduplication pipeline and version alignment system.

name: Sequence Length Truncation Causing Information Loss in Methods Section
description_html: Model is truncating important experimental details in methods sections due to fixed sequence length constraints. This affects approximately 15% of papers with detailed protocols, leading to incomplete information extraction. Impact: Reduced accuracy in methodology comparison and reproducibility analysis.

name: Performance Degradation in Cross-Language Reference Matching
description_html: Reference matching accuracy has dropped below 85% for papers with mixed-language citations. The current embedding space isn't properly aligning equivalent references across different languages, causing duplicate entries and missed connections in the citation network.

name: GPU Memory Spikes During Multi-Modal Table Processing
description_html: Processing of large scientific tables with mixed text and numerical data is causing unexpected GPU memory spikes, leading to OOM errors. This affects about 5% of papers with complex data tables, particularly in genomics and chemistry domains.

name: Confidence Score Calibration Drift for Novel Research Topics
description_html: Model confidence scores are poorly calibrated for papers covering emerging research topics, showing overconfidence in classification decisions. This reduces the reliability of our automated topic tagging system for cutting-edge research areas.

name: Equation Tokenization Errors in LaTeX-to-Text Conversion
description_html: Mathematical equations are being incorrectly tokenized during LaTeX-to-text conversion, leading to corrupted training data for papers in mathematics and physics domains. This affects model understanding of mathematical relationships and derivations.

name: Data Augmentation Artifacts in Supplementary Material Processing
description_html: Current data augmentation techniques are introducing artifacts when processing supplementary materials, particularly for papers with extensive protocols or datasets. This is causing the model to learn spurious correlations and affecting the quality of methodology extraction.

name: Batch Normalization Statistics Skew in Incremental Training
description_html: Running statistics for batch normalization layers show significant deviation when training on incrementally added research papers. This causes degraded performance on older document categories while processing new additions. Impact: Reduced accuracy in document classification for established research domains.

name: Memory Leak in Dynamic Knowledge Graph Updates
description_html: Continuous update process for the research knowledge graph accumulates unreleased tensor memory over time. Memory usage grows linearly with each graph update cycle. Impact: Requires frequent system restarts and interrupts real-time graph updates.

name: Checkpoint Corruption in Multi-GPU Training of Citation Parser
description_html: Distributed training across multiple GPUs occasionally produces corrupted checkpoints when saving model weights. Validation loss shows unexpected spikes after resuming from affected checkpoints. Impact: Training pipeline instability and lost progress in model improvements.

name: Methodology Section Classifier Bias Towards Specific Disciplines
description_html: The methodology section classifier shows systematic bias favoring computational and quantitative research descriptions while underperforming on qualitative and theoretical methodology identification. Impact: Incomplete or incorrect methodology extraction for humanities and social science papers.

name: Feature Attribution Instability in Research Trend Detection
description_html: SHAP values for research trend detection model show high variance between runs on the same input data, leading to inconsistent explanations of trend emergence. Impact: Reduced reliability of trend analysis reports and difficulty in validating model decisions.

name: Inconsistent Tokenization of Chemical Formulas and Mathematical Notation
description_html: Current tokenizer splits chemical formulas and mathematical expressions inconsistently, leading to poor representation learning in domain-specific contexts. Impact: Reduced accuracy in chemistry and mathematics paper processing and relationship extraction.

name: Positional Encoding Overflow in Extra-Long Research Papers
description_html: Transformer models experience position encoding overflow when processing unusually long research papers (>100 pages), causing attention mechanism failures. Impact: Unable to properly process and analyze comprehensive review papers and detailed technical reports.

name: Attention Layer Saturation During Multi-Document Synthesis
description_html: Attention layers in the multi-document synthesis model are experiencing saturation when processing large sets of related papers (>50 papers). This causes degraded performance in identifying key relationships between papers and missing important cross-references. Impact: Reduced quality of literature review summaries and incomplete research connection mapping.

name: Temporal Coherence Loss in Sequential Abstract Processing
description_html: The sequential abstract processing pipeline is failing to maintain temporal coherence when analyzing research evolution over time. Model outputs show inconsistent understanding of methodology progression and citation relationships between papers published in different years. This affects our ability to accurately track research development trajectories.

name: Intermittent database connection timeouts in containerized MongoDB cluster
description_html: Multiple database connection timeouts observed in the MongoDB cluster running on our Kubernetes deployment. Timeouts occur randomly but increase during peak research data ingestion periods. Causing delayed data persistence and occasional failed writes. Investigation needed into network policies, connection pooling configuration, and potential resource constraints.

name: Excessive cold storage costs from uncompressed research datasets
description_html: Monthly cloud storage costs have increased by 40% due to uncompressed dataset files being automatically moved to cold storage. Current archival process is not applying compression before transfer. Need to implement automated compression pipeline and optimize storage lifecycle policies to reduce costs while maintaining data integrity.

name: Service mesh latency spikes during cross-zone traffic routing
description_html: Users experiencing 2-3 second delays when requests are routed between availability zones in our service mesh. Istio metrics show increased latency in cross-zone communication. Impacts real-time collaboration features and search functionality. Requires investigation of mesh configuration, network policies, and potential need for zone-aware routing rules.

name: Terraform state lock contention blocking parallel deployments
description_html: CI/CD pipelines experiencing failures due to Terraform state locks not being properly released. Multiple deployment jobs competing for state access causing pipeline delays up to 15 minutes. Need to implement better state management strategy and investigate potential migration to remote state with better locking mechanisms.

name: Redis cache eviction spike causing increased database load
description_html: Redis cluster experiencing unexpected cache evictions during peak hours, leading to increased load on primary database. Memory usage metrics show 95% utilization before eviction. Research query caching efficiency degraded by 60%. Need to analyze memory allocation, adjust eviction policies, and evaluate cache size requirements.

name: Kubernetes node autoscaling delay causing research job queue backlog
description_html: Node autoscaling in the research compute cluster is taking 3-4 minutes to respond to increased workload demands. This delay is causing research batch jobs to remain queued longer than acceptable SLA targets. Multiple researchers have reported computation delays during peak submission periods. Investigation needed into cluster-autoscaler configuration and potential preemptive scaling strategies.

name: ElasticSearch cluster showing uneven shard distribution
description_html: Search index performance degradation observed due to imbalanced shard allocation across cluster nodes. Some nodes are handling significantly more search traffic than others, leading to inconsistent query response times. Paper search functionality is experiencing sporadic slowdowns during high-volume periods. Requires rebalancing strategy and potential cluster topology adjustments.

name: Cloud NAT gateway IP exhaustion during citation API synchronization
description_html: External citation API calls are failing intermittently due to IP address exhaustion in the Cloud NAT gateway. This is affecting real-time paper reference updates and bibliography generation services. Current NAT gateway configuration cannot handle the volume of outbound connections during peak synchronization periods. Need to implement IP address expansion and connection pooling optimization.

name: Prometheus metrics retention policy causing storage volume saturation
description_html: Monitoring system storage volumes reaching capacity due to aggressive metrics retention. Historical performance data for research workloads is being prematurely truncated. Current retention policy and storage allocation need review. Impact includes limited ability to analyze long-term platform usage patterns and performance trends.

name: CORS configuration blocking legitimate API requests from partner institutions
description_html: Restrictive CORS policy is preventing authorized cross-origin requests from partner university domains. Researchers unable to access API endpoints from institutional platforms. Security policy requires update to accommodate legitimate academic domain patterns while maintaining protection against unauthorized access.

name: Insufficient pod disruption budgets causing service instability during node updates
description_html: Automated node updates are causing brief service interruptions due to inadequate pod disruption budget configurations. Multiple microservices experiencing momentary downtime during routine maintenance windows. Need to implement proper PDB settings and review rolling update strategies to maintain service availability during cluster maintenance.

name: Log aggregation pipeline dropping events during traffic spikes
description_html: Fluentd log aggregation system unable to handle sudden bursts in log volume, resulting in lost debugging data during critical incidents. System performance and security audit trails incomplete during high-activity periods. Buffer configuration and processing pipeline require optimization to prevent data loss.

name: Identity provider federation timeout affecting multi-institution SSO logins
description_html: SAML authentication requests timing out for users from federated academic institutions during peak access periods. Researchers experiencing session initialization failures when accessing platform through institutional SSO. Investigation needed into IdP connection pooling and timeout configurations.

name: S3 lifecycle policies failing to transition archived papers to Glacier storage
description_html: Automated lifecycle policies for moving research papers older than 180 days to Glacier storage are not executing. Currently affecting approximately 45TB of infrequently accessed data, resulting in elevated storage costs. Investigation shows possible IAM role permission conflicts with newly implemented bucket policies.

name: Network policy misconfiguration blocking inter-service communication in citation processor
description_html: Citation processing microservices unable to communicate with metadata extraction service due to overly restrictive Kubernetes network policies. Affecting approximately 15% of new paper submissions, causing delays in citation graph updates and bibliography generation.

name: CloudFront origin shield not properly caching large dataset downloads
description_html: Origin shield layer in CloudFront distribution is bypassing cache for research dataset downloads larger than 5GB. This is causing unnecessary load on origin servers and increased egress costs. Affects primarily genomics and climate datasets accessed by multiple research institutions.

name: Vault auto-unsealing failing after KMS key rotation
description_html: HashiCorp Vault clusters failing to auto-unseal after automated KMS key rotation, requiring manual intervention. Critical security issue affecting access to secrets management for all research application environments. Current workaround requires manual unsealing every 30 days.

name: EKS worker nodes OOMKilling annotation processing pods
description_html: Worker nodes in EKS cluster experiencing memory pressure during peak annotation processing, leading to OOMKill events. Memory limits may need adjustment, but current node instance types already at maximum available memory. Impacting researcher ability to add annotations during high-traffic periods.

name: WAF rules blocking legitimate LaTeX equation submissions
description_html: Web Application Firewall rules incorrectly identifying LaTeX mathematical equations as potential XSS attacks. False positives are preventing researchers from submitting papers containing complex mathematical notation. Affects approximately 30% of submissions in mathematics and physics categories.

name: GPU instance quota exceeded in machine learning preprocessing pipeline
description_html: Regional quota for P3 GPU instances reached during parallel preprocessing of research datasets. Machine learning pipeline backlogged with 200+ pending jobs. Current quota increase request pending AWS support response. Affecting time-sensitive research projects requiring GPU acceleration.

name: Certificate rotation automation failing for internal service mesh mTLS
description_html: Automated certificate rotation for service mesh mTLS failing to propagate new certificates to all services. Manual intervention required every 90 days to prevent service-to-service communication failures. Root cause appears to be timing issue with sidecar injection in new pods.

name: Redis cluster failover mechanism not triggering during network partitions
description_html: Redis cluster nodes are not properly executing failover procedures during network partitions, causing temporary service disruptions for user session management and rate limiting. Sentinel configuration appears to have incorrect quorum settings, and split-brain scenarios have been observed. This affects login persistence and API quota enforcement.

name: RabbitMQ queue memory consumption spiking during bulk paper imports
description_html: Memory usage in RabbitMQ cluster increases dramatically during large-scale paper import operations, leading to high water mark alerts and potential message processing delays. Queue persistence settings and consumer scaling strategies need review to handle batch processing more efficiently.

name: Ingress controller rate limiting not respecting X-Forwarded-For headers
description_html: Rate limiting implementation in NGINX ingress controller is using direct client IPs instead of the X-Forwarded-For header, causing false throttling for users behind institutional proxies. This impacts research groups accessing the platform through university networks.

name: Etcd backup snapshots failing integrity verification checks
description_html: Automated etcd cluster backup snapshots are failing integrity verification, potentially compromising our disaster recovery capabilities. Checksum mismatches observed in backup artifacts, and restoration tests have failed. Critical for maintaining Kubernetes cluster state backup reliability.

name: Container registry garbage collection disrupting concurrent image pulls
description_html: Registry garbage collection is causing intermittent failures for container image pulls during peak deployment periods. Layer blob references becoming temporarily unavailable during compaction process. Need to optimize garbage collection timing and implement proper image manifest retention policies.

name: Cross-zone load balancer health checks failing for WebSocket endpoints
description_html: Load balancer health checks are incorrectly marking WebSocket endpoints as unhealthy in secondary availability zones, leading to reduced fault tolerance for real-time collaboration features. TCP keep-alive configurations and health check paths require adjustment.

name: VPC flow logs missing entries for internal service mesh traffic
description_html: Network flow logs are not capturing all traffic between services in the mesh, creating blind spots in security auditing and troubleshooting capabilities. Investigation needed into flow log configuration and potential conflicts with service mesh sidecar implementations.

name: Terraform state lock timeout causing concurrent deployment conflicts
description_html: Multiple CI/CD pipelines attempting infrastructure updates are failing due to stuck Terraform state locks in DynamoDB. Lock entries aren't being properly released after pipeline cancellations, requiring manual intervention. This is blocking critical infrastructure updates and causing deployment delays across teams.

name: ElasticSearch cluster shards failing to relocate after node termination
description_html: Automatic shard relocation is not occurring when spot instances are terminated, leading to yellow cluster status and reduced search performance. Impact includes degraded search functionality across the platform and increased latency for research paper discovery features.

name: Prometheus time series database running out of storage in citation analytics cluster
description_html: Metrics retention is exceeding allocated storage due to increased cardinality from new citation tracking features. Storage utilization is at 95% and growing, risking monitoring data loss and dashboard outages for the research analytics system.

name: IAM role assumption delays causing timeouts in metadata service
description_html: Cross-account role assumptions are experiencing intermittent delays up to 30 seconds, causing API timeouts in services that handle researcher profile metadata. This is affecting user profile updates and institution affiliation verification workflows.

name: Kubernetes node autoscaler failing to terminate nodes with GPU workloads
description_html: Cluster Autoscaler unable to properly drain nodes running GPU-accelerated paper analysis workloads, leading to stuck terminations and excess infrastructure costs. Affected nodes remain in the cluster despite being empty, preventing efficient resource utilization.

name: Database connection pooling exhaustion during bulk reference imports
description_html: PgBouncer connection pools being depleted during large-scale bibliography imports, causing cascading timeouts across dependent services. New connection requests are being rejected, impacting researcher ability to upload and process reference lists.

name: Service mesh proxy memory leak in citation verification endpoints
description_html: Envoy proxies in the service mesh are experiencing memory growth when handling large citation verification batches, eventually triggering OOM kills. This is causing intermittent failures in the citation validation pipeline and affecting paper submission workflows.

name: Route53 health checks failing for multi-region PDF rendering service
description_html: DNS health checks are incorrectly marking healthy PDF rendering endpoints as down, causing unnecessary failovers between regions. This is resulting in increased latency and occasional failures when researchers attempt to generate PDF previews of their manuscripts.

name: S3 lifecycle policies failing to archive dormant research datasets
description_html: Storage costs increasing as automated archival rules for inactive research datasets aren't transitioning objects to Glacier storage tier. Investigation shows lifecycle policies are evaluating metadata tags incorrectly, causing datasets to remain in standard storage. Impacts monthly infrastructure costs and storage optimization targets.

name: gRPC load balancer configuration causing connection draining timeouts
description_html: Long-running research computation streams experiencing unexpected disconnections due to improper connection draining settings in gRPC load balancer. Connection termination occurs before streams complete, causing data loss and requiring computation restarts. Affects reliability of distributed analysis workflows.

name: Batch processing jobs stuck in terminating state after spot instance interruption
description_html: Research data processing jobs remain stuck in terminating state when spot instances are interrupted, preventing new jobs from starting and causing queue buildup. Manual intervention required to clear stuck jobs. Affecting automated dataset processing pipeline reliability.

name: DNS resolution delays in cross-region citation service lookups
description_html: Intermittent high latency in citation verification service due to DNS resolution delays between regions. TTL settings and Route53 resolver endpoints not optimized for cross-region lookup patterns. Causing slowdown in paper submission workflow during peak hours.

name: EFS mount targets reaching IOPS limits during concurrent thesis uploads
description_html: Performance degradation observed in shared storage system during peak thesis submission periods. EFS mount targets hitting IOPS limits, causing upload failures and slow access to research materials. Bursting credits depleting faster than expected under current workload patterns.

name: Secret rotation automation failing for multi-region database clusters
description_html: Automated credential rotation process failing to synchronize updates across all regional database replicas, causing authentication failures in failover scenarios. Manual intervention required to ensure consistency. Impacts disaster recovery readiness and security compliance requirements.

name: CloudFront edge caching inconsistent for PDF preview thumbnails
description_html: Edge locations are serving stale or missing PDF preview thumbnails due to incorrect cache invalidation patterns. Users in APAC region reporting 404 errors for thumbnail generation endpoints. Cache hit rates have dropped to 45% from expected 90%, increasing origin server load.

name: Grafana dashboards showing gaps in metrics collection for ML inference endpoints
description_html: Time series data for ML model inference endpoints shows intermittent gaps in metrics collection. Prometheus scrape jobs are failing to capture data during high-load periods, affecting our ability to monitor model performance and resource utilization. Investigation needed into possible cardinality limits or storage compression issues.

name: Network policy conflicts preventing cross-namespace service discovery
description_html: Conflicting network policies in the Kubernetes cluster are preventing proper service discovery between citation analysis and document processing namespaces. This causes intermittent communication failures between microservices and affects the reliability of the paper processing pipeline. Policy audit and reconciliation needed.

name: API Gateway throttling limits too aggressive for batch citation uploads
description_html: Current API Gateway throttling configuration is causing request failures during batch citation uploads from institutional partners. Rate limits need adjustment to accommodate legitimate high-volume usage patterns while maintaining protection against abuse. Multiple research institutions affected during end-of-semester paper submissions.

name: Redis cluster experiencing split-brain during AZ failover
description_html: Redis cluster nodes in different availability zones are failing to properly coordinate during automatic failover events, resulting in split-brain scenarios. This causes temporary data inconsistency in the research paper caching layer and duplicate cache entries.

name: ElasticSearch snapshot repository corruption in cold storage tier
description_html: Automated ElasticSearch snapshots to S3 cold storage are showing signs of corruption during integrity checks. This affects our ability to restore historical research index data and compromises our long-term backup strategy for academic content.

name: Container image vulnerability scanning pipeline exceeding timeout limits
description_html: Security scanning jobs for container images are timing out after 30 minutes, causing deployments to fail. The increased scan time is due to larger image sizes from new ML model dependencies. This is blocking critical security updates from reaching production.

name: VPC endpoint service quotas reached in primary research region
description_html: Hit maximum VPC endpoint service quota in us-east-1, preventing new private service connections. This blocks deployment of new internal services and affects ability to maintain network isolation. Currently at 90/90 endpoints used.

name: Race condition in concurrent dataset versioning API
description_html: Multiple simultaneous requests to the dataset versioning endpoint (/api/v1/datasets/{id}/versions) are causing data integrity issues. When two users attempt to create a new version simultaneously, both requests occasionally succeed but only one version is recorded. This leads to missing version history and potential data loss. Impact: Research teams unable to properly track dataset changes. Requires implementation of proper locking mechanism.

name: Memory leak in long-running GraphQL subscription connections
description_html: The real-time collaboration websocket endpoint is not properly cleaning up resources when clients disconnect abnormally. Each orphaned connection consumes ~50MB of memory and persists until server restart. Server memory usage grows by approximately 2GB per day under normal load. Impact: Requires weekly server restarts to prevent OOM crashes. Need to implement proper connection cleanup and resource management.

name: Inconsistent response format for bulk citation export API
description_html: The /api/v2/citations/export endpoint returns inconsistent JSON structures when handling large citation batches (>1000 entries). Some responses include nested metadata objects while others flatten the same data. This breaks client parsing logic and causes export failures. Impact: Users unable to reliably export large citation sets. Need to standardize response format and add response schema validation.

name: Redis cache not invalidating after collaborative annotation updates
description_html: When multiple users are simultaneously annotating a document, the Redis cache layer is not properly invalidating cached content after updates. This causes some users to see stale annotation data for up to 5 minutes. Impact: Confusing user experience during collaborative sessions and potential for lost annotations. Need to implement proper cache invalidation triggers and potential pub/sub mechanism.

name: PDF processing queue timeout for large multi-language documents
description_html: The document processing service is timing out when handling PDFs larger than 50MB that contain multiple language scripts. Worker processes exceed the 300s timeout limit during OCR and text extraction. Impact: Researchers unable to import large multilingual papers. Need to implement chunked processing and progress tracking for large documents.

name: Authentication token refresh endpoint returns stale permissions
description_html: When users' permissions are updated, the /auth/refresh endpoint continues returning tokens with outdated role information for up to 15 minutes. This causes newly revoked users to retain access and newly granted permissions to be delayed. Impact: Security risk and user experience degradation when permission changes are time-sensitive.

name: Metadata extraction service fails for DOIs containing non-ASCII characters
description_html: The metadata extraction service crashes when processing DOIs that contain UTF-8 characters, particularly affecting papers with non-English titles. This affects approximately 8% of incoming papers from European and Asian journals. Error logs show encoding issues in the HTTP client layer.

name: Batch reference resolution API deadlock during high concurrency
description_html: The /references/resolve-batch endpoint experiences deadlocks under high concurrent load (>50 req/sec), causing transaction timeouts and incomplete reference resolutions. Database locks are not being released properly when multiple users simultaneously submit large batches of references for resolution.

name: WebSocket connection drops during large annotation sync
description_html: WebSocket connections are unexpectedly closing when syncing more than 1000 annotations in a single batch. Investigation shows buffer overflow in the message queue and no automatic reconnection handling. Users lose unsaved changes and need to manually refresh to restore connectivity.

name: Search API ignoring field weights for author name queries
description_html: The Elasticsearch implementation for author name searches is not respecting the configured field weights, causing less relevant results to appear first. Specifically, middle names and initials are being ranked higher than full first names in author searches, leading to poor search result quality.

name: Citation export API fails to escape LaTeX special characters
description_html: The /export/citation endpoint is not properly escaping LaTeX special characters (%, $, _, etc.) when generating BibTeX output. This causes syntax errors when users attempt to use the exported citations in their LaTeX documents, particularly for titles containing mathematical notation.

name: Duplicate entries created by retry logic in reference matching service
description_html: The reference matching service's retry mechanism is creating duplicate entries when requests timeout but actually succeed. The idempotency keys are not being properly maintained across retry attempts, resulting in duplicate references appearing in users' libraries.

name: Group permission changes not propagating to nested collections
description_html: Updates to group permissions via the PATCH /groups/{id}/permissions endpoint are not cascading properly to nested collection hierarchies. Changes to parent collection access levels are not being inherited by subcollections, leading to inconsistent permission states and access control issues.

name: API rate limiter bypass through distributed client requests
description_html: Clients are bypassing rate limits by distributing requests across multiple IP addresses while maintaining the same auth token. Current rate limiting implementation only checks IP address, not accounting for authenticated session limits. This allows potential abuse of API resources and needs to be updated to consider both IP and token-based limitations.

name: Malformed XML in CrossRef response parser causing citation failures
description_html: The CrossRef API response parser fails to handle certain edge cases in XML formatting, particularly with nested HTML entities within author names. This causes citation retrieval failures for approximately 3% of DOI lookups, primarily affecting papers with special characters in author names or titles.

name: Elastic Search query timeout for complex boolean filters
description_html: Advanced search queries combining multiple boolean filters and full-text search are timing out when result sets exceed 10,000 documents. The current query optimization doesn't effectively handle complex combinations of field-specific filters, causing performance degradation and poor user experience for power users.

name: Inconsistent timestamp formats in annotation history API
description_html: The annotation history endpoint returns inconsistent timestamp formats depending on the annotation source. Direct API-created annotations use ISO8601, while imported annotations maintain their original timestamp format. This inconsistency breaks client-side sorting and filtering functionality.

name: Orphaned file attachments not cleaned up after failed bulk imports
description_html: When bulk import operations fail mid-process, uploaded file attachments remain in temporary storage without being cleaned up. This has resulted in accumulating storage usage and potential resource leaks. Need to implement proper cleanup mechanism for partial import failures.

name: Reference deduplication service failing for preprint versions
description_html: The reference deduplication service fails to properly identify and merge references when papers have both preprint and published versions. This results in duplicate entries in user libraries and incorrect citation counts. The matching algorithm needs to be updated to handle DOI aliases and preprint-to-publication mappings.

name: Broken transaction isolation in collaborative note updates
description_html: Concurrent updates to shared research notes occasionally result in lost changes due to improper transaction isolation levels. The current implementation doesn't properly handle overlapping updates, leading to race conditions where the last-write-wins strategy causes unintended data loss.

name: Missing content-type validation in file upload API
description_html: The file upload endpoint accepts files without properly validating their content-type headers, allowing potentially malicious files to be uploaded. While file extensions are checked, the lack of content validation poses a security risk and could lead to storage of inappropriate file types.

name: Redis cache invalidation failing for partial reference updates
description_html: The cache invalidation mechanism is not properly handling partial updates to reference objects, causing stale data to be served. This occurs when only specific fields of a reference are updated through the PATCH /references endpoint. The cache entry for the full reference object remains unchanged, leading to inconsistencies between the cached and database versions. Impact: Users are seeing outdated reference data for up to 15 minutes after updates.

name: GraphQL resolver timeout during deep nested collection queries
description_html: When users request deeply nested collections (>4 levels) through the GraphQL API, the resolver times out after 30 seconds. Investigation shows the N+1 query problem is causing excessive database calls. This particularly affects large research groups with complex collection hierarchies. Impact: Users cannot fetch complete collection structures for deep hierarchies.

name: Async PDF processing queue backing up during peak usage
description_html: The asynchronous PDF processing queue is experiencing significant backlog during peak usage hours (10AM-2PM EST). Worker processes are not scaling fast enough to handle the incoming load, leading to processing delays of up to 45 minutes. Root cause appears to be inefficient resource allocation in the worker pool. Impact: Users experiencing long delays in PDF parsing and text extraction.

name: JWT token refresh mechanism failing for concurrent requests
description_html: The JWT refresh token mechanism is failing when multiple requests attempt to refresh the same token simultaneously. This creates a race condition where only one request succeeds while others receive 401 errors. The issue is most noticeable in collaborative sessions where multiple tabs/users are active. Impact: Users being unexpectedly logged out during active sessions.

name: Mendeley API integration failing to handle author name variants
description_html: The Mendeley reference import API integration is not properly handling author name variants, causing duplicate author entries. The normalization algorithm fails to recognize different formats of the same author name (e.g., 'J. Smith' vs 'John Smith'). Impact: Manual cleanup required for imported reference libraries with variant author names.

name: Bulk export API not respecting field-level permissions
description_html: The bulk export API endpoint is including private fields in the export data regardless of user permission levels. This affects custom metadata fields marked as private at the organization level. The permission check is being bypassed in the bulk operation handler. Impact: Potential exposure of private organizational metadata in exported datasets.

name: Citation style processor memory leak for large bibliographies
description_html: The citation style processor service is experiencing memory leaks when handling bibliographies with over 500 references. Memory usage grows linearly with each processed citation and isn't being properly released. This affects the citation export API and inline citation rendering. Impact: Service requires frequent restarts and fails for large bibliography exports.

name: Inconsistent reference key generation for preprint versions
description_html: The reference key generation algorithm is producing inconsistent keys for different versions of the same preprint. The version number is not being properly incorporated into the uniqueness check, leading to key collisions. This affects the BibTeX export and citation management features. Impact: Users unable to maintain separate citations for different preprint versions.

name: Rate limiting bypass vulnerability in OAuth token refresh endpoint
description_html: The OAuth token refresh endpoint (/auth/refresh) is not properly counting against rate limits when clients use the refresh_token grant type. This allows potential DoS attacks by repeatedly requesting new access tokens. Impact: Excessive load on auth servers and potential service degradation. Need to implement consistent rate limiting across all authentication flows.

name: DOI resolution service failing to handle Unicode characters in titles
description_html: The DOI resolution microservice is failing to properly encode/decode Unicode characters in publication titles, causing failed lookups for papers with non-ASCII characters. This affects approximately 15% of papers from non-English journals. Resolution attempts result in 404 errors when titles contain accents, mathematical symbols, or non-Latin characters.

name: Deadlock in concurrent bibliographic record updates
description_html: Database deadlocks occurring during high-concurrency bibliography updates when multiple users edit the same collection simultaneously. The row-level locking strategy in the bibliography_entries table is causing transaction timeouts and rolled back changes. Need to implement optimistic locking or revise the transaction isolation level.

name: Metadata extraction service hanging on malformed PDF metadata
description_html: The PDF metadata extraction service becomes unresponsive when processing PDFs with corrupted XMP metadata blocks. Worker processes are not timing out properly, leading to resource exhaustion on the processing cluster. Need to implement robust error handling and worker timeouts for malformed metadata scenarios.

name: CORS configuration blocking legitimate API requests from institutional proxies
description_html: Current CORS policy is rejecting valid API requests from institutional proxy servers, affecting users accessing the API through university networks. The Origin header validation needs to be updated to handle proxy scenarios while maintaining security. Multiple academic institutions reported access issues.

name: Citation graph API returning incomplete results for deeply nested references
description_html: The citation graph traversal API (/api/v2/papers/{id}/citation-tree) is truncating results for papers with deep citation chains (>5 levels). The recursive query is hitting internal timeouts before complete traversal. Affects citation analysis features and impact metrics calculations.

name: Batch reference import silently failing for RIS files over 5MB
description_html: The RIS file import endpoint is failing to process files larger than 5MB but returning a 200 OK status. No error is logged or returned to the client. This affects users trying to import large reference libraries from EndNote and RefWorks. Need to implement proper error handling and client notification for oversized files.

name: API response serialization error for large LaTeX equations
description_html: The JSON serialization process is failing when handling LaTeX equations longer than 2KB in the /equations endpoint. This causes HTTP 500 errors when users attempt to save complex mathematical notation. Impact: Mathematical papers with extensive equations cannot be properly saved or retrieved. Affects approximately 3% of uploads in the physics and mathematics categories.

name: Elasticsearch indexing deadlock during concurrent author merges
description_html: Multiple simultaneous author merge operations are causing deadlocks in the Elasticsearch indexing pipeline. When two author profiles are being merged concurrently, the system occasionally enters a deadlock state, requiring manual intervention to resolve. This is causing delayed updates to author profiles and inconsistent search results.

name: Memory overflow in bibliographic deduplication service
description_html: The bibliographic deduplication service is experiencing out-of-memory errors when processing large institutional libraries (>100K references). The fuzzy matching algorithm's memory consumption grows exponentially with the input size, causing service crashes during bulk imports from institutional repositories.

name: API rate limiter not accounting for proxy-forwarded IPs
description_html: The rate limiting system is not correctly processing X-Forwarded-For headers, causing all requests from institutional proxies to be counted under a single IP address. This results in false rate limit triggers for legitimate institutional users sharing the same proxy, particularly affecting large university networks.

name: Inconsistent handling of UTF-8 characters in BibTeX export
description_html: The BibTeX export endpoint is inconsistently encoding UTF-8 characters in author names and titles. Some special characters are being escaped properly while others are being converted to ? characters. This is causing problems for users trying to integrate with LaTeX workflows, particularly for non-English publications.

name: Stale cache in citation style preview generator
description_html: The citation style preview service is not properly invalidating its cache when citation styles are updated. Users are seeing outdated citation formats for up to 24 hours after style updates are published. This particularly affects custom institutional citation styles and newly released journal format requirements.

name: Async worker pool exhaustion during bulk metadata imports
description_html: Worker threads in the metadata processing pool are becoming exhausted during large-scale imports, causing subsequent requests to timeout. Investigation shows workers aren't being properly released after processing errors. This affects platform stability during batch operations and needs immediate attention.

name: Redis connection pool leaks in annotation versioning service
description_html: Connection pool for Redis cache is gradually leaking connections when handling annotation version history requests. After approximately 24 hours of operation, new annotation saves begin to fail due to exhausted connections. Requires implementation of proper connection cleanup and pool management.

name: Malformed JSON responses from author merge endpoint
description_html: The POST /api/v2/authors/merge endpoint is returning malformed JSON when merging authors with extended character names. Response serializer isn't properly escaping certain Unicode characters, causing client-side parsing failures. This blocks institutional users from cleaning up duplicate author records.

name: JWT validation bypass for expired refresh tokens
description_html: Security vulnerability discovered where expired refresh tokens are still being accepted if the signature is valid, even though the expiration claim has passed. This circumvents our token lifecycle management and could allow unauthorized access. Immediate fix required to enforce proper JWT expiration validation.

name: Inconsistent ETags for cached search results
description_html: Search result caching system is generating inconsistent ETags for identical queries due to non-deterministic ordering of internal result maps. This causes unnecessary cache misses and increased server load. Need to implement consistent hash generation for search result sets.

name: Missing validation for circular reference dependencies
description_html: API endpoints for managing reference relationships lack validation for circular dependencies, allowing creation of infinite reference loops. This causes stack overflow errors in the citation tree traversal service and breaks PDF exports. Need to implement cycle detection in the reference graph validation layer.

name: DOI resolution service failing silently for Crossref API timeouts
description_html: The DOI resolution microservice is not properly handling timeout scenarios from Crossref API, resulting in silent failures instead of graceful degradation. When Crossref experiences delays >5s, our service returns a 200 OK with empty metadata instead of falling back to alternative sources or returning an appropriate error code. This affects approximately 8% of DOI lookups during peak hours.

name: Deadlock in concurrent PDF annotation persistence layer
description_html: Multiple users annotating the same PDF simultaneously triggers a deadlock in the annotation persistence layer. The issue manifests when >3 concurrent writes attempt to update the annotation index for a single document. This results in hung requests and requires manual intervention to resolve the locked state. Affects collaborative annotation features in shared workspaces.

name: Keyboard navigation breaks in search results pagination
description_html: Tab navigation becomes trapped in an infinite loop when users attempt to navigate through paginated search results using only keyboard controls. This severely impacts keyboard-only users and creates an accessibility barrier for navigating large result sets. Focus state is not properly managed between page transitions.

name: Reference management drag-and-drop fails on touch devices
description_html: Users on tablets and touch-enabled laptops cannot properly drag and reorder references in their bibliography lists. The drag handles are too small for touch targets and the drop zones do not properly highlight on touch interactions. This is causing frustration for researchers trying to organize citations on their mobile devices.

name: Color contrast ratios fail WCAG standards in dark mode
description_html: Several UI elements in dark mode theme do not meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards for color contrast, particularly in the annotation sidebar and citation preview cards. Text becomes difficult to read for users with visual impairments. Contrast ratios need to be adjusted while maintaining the dark mode aesthetic.

name: Bulk metadata editor layout breaks at intermediate breakpoints
description_html: The bulk metadata editor interface becomes unusable at tablet and small desktop viewport widths (768px-1024px). Table columns overlap, action buttons become inaccessible, and form inputs are cut off. This prevents researchers from efficiently managing multiple citations on devices with these screen sizes.

name: Screen reader announces duplicate labels in filter panel
description_html: The advanced search filter panel contains redundant ARIA labels causing screen readers to announce filter options multiple times. This creates a confusing and verbose experience for visually impaired users trying to refine their literature searches. Filter components need proper ARIA attribute cleanup.

name: Citation preview tooltips not rendering LaTeX equations correctly
description_html: LaTeX mathematical equations within citation preview tooltips appear as raw markup instead of rendered mathematics. This affects readability when users hover over mathematical paper citations, forcing them to open the full reference to verify equation content.
